mapper.sql:
SELECT T.id, T.count_date, T.today_reg_user, T.today_wx_reg_user, T.today_order_user, T.count_user_num, T.today_pay_order, T.today_unpay_order, T.today_user_order, T.count_order_num, T.today_trade_money, T.count_trade_money, T.add_time FROM nideshop_statistics T WHERE 1=1
AND T.NAME LIKE '%${params.name}%'
mapper.select: (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from nideshop_user where date_format(register_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format (now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) today_reg_user, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from nideshop_user where date_format(register_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format (now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and weixin_openid is not null) today_wx_reg_user, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from nideshop_user where date_format(register_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format (now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and id in (select user_id from nideshop_order)) today_order_user, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from nideshop_user) count_user_num, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from nideshop_order where pay_status=2 and date_format(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format (now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) today_pay_order, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from nideshop_order where pay_status=1 and date_format(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format (now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) today_unpay_order, (select IFNULL(count(distinct(user_id)),0) from nideshop_order where pay_status=2 and date_format(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format (now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) today_user_order, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from nideshop_order where pay_status=2) count_order_num, (select IFNULL(sum(order_price),0) from nideshop_order where pay_status=2 and date_format(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format (now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) today_trade_money, (select IFNULL(sum(order_price),0) from nideshop_order where pay_status=2) count_trade_money from dual;
